abstract: Apple will release the next version of its OS X operating system for Macs on Friday, a week earlier than expected and well before Microsoft’s new Windows 7 for PCs is due.
snippet: Apple will release the next version of its OS X operating system for Macs on Friday, a week earlier than expected and well before Microsoft’s new Windows 7 for PCs is due.

headline.main: Apple’s Snow Leopard Set to Pounce on Friday
